item.title: Microsoft taps India’s Varaha for durable carbon removal offtake
item.description: Microsoft is buying over 100,000 tons of carbon dioxide removal credits from India's Varaha over the next three years.

item.title: Mira Murati’s startup, Thinking Machines Lab, is losing two of its co-founders to OpenAI
item.description: The abrupt change in personnel was in the works for several weeks, according to an OpenAI executive.

item.title: The FTC’s data-sharing order against GM is finally settled
item.description: The order, first proposed a year ago, bans GM from collecting and then selling geolocation data to third parties, like data brokers and insurance comp...

item.title: India’s Emversity doubles valuation as it scales workers AI can’t replace
item.description: Emversity has raised $30 million in a new round as it scales job-ready training in India.

item.title: Musk denies awareness of Grok sexual underage images as California AG launches probe
item.description: The California attorney general has opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk's xAI after its chatbot Grok began generating nonconsensual sexual im...
